title: Move RichCodeNav to its own job
body: It's taking longer than we initially hoped so moving it to get it off the critical path.

commit.message:
Move RichCodeNav to its own job

It's taking longer than we initially hoped so moving it to get it off the critical path.

nodes.body: `continueOnError: true` should do that (it'll be `SucceededWithIssues` instead of `Succeeded` but should show as passed).
Ah; that's not on the `build.cmd` invocation but . . . that should always work too; I don't mind "testing" it in this job.
